title: Steamed carrot and zucchini tagliatelle

ingredients.content: 1 ½ tbsp extra virgin olive oil

preparations.content: Using a vegetable peeler, cut carrots into long thin slices, similar to tagliatelle pasta. Repeat with zucchini. If necessary, deseed zucchini thenslice zucchini lengthways with vegetable peeler so that some green peel remains on each strip. Place carrot and zucchini tagliatelle loosely into Varoma dish.

Place water into mixing bowl, place Varoma into position and steam <b>8-10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Place steamed vegetable tagliatelle into a serving bowl and season with extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice and salt. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Serve vegetable tagliatelle with tomato pasta sauce.
